name: SYNERGY The Real Kombucha - Strawberry Serenity - 16 fl oz Bottle - Raw Probiotic Drink for Gut Health and Immune Support
short_description: #1 KOMBUCHA BRAND IN THE US: Always raw, never pasteurized kombucha; Fresh waves of delicious strawberry juice
BILLIONS OF LIVING PROBIOTICS: This SYNERGY Kombucha drink is rich with billions of diverse, naturally occurring living probiotics
HOLISTIC HEALTH FOR MIND AND BODY: Scientifically backed to support gut health, immunity, brain function, and protein absorption

AUTHENTIC FERMENTED TEA: Traditionally fermented in small batches for weeks—not days—using heirloom Himalayan cultures; Since 1995, GT's Living Foods has been crafting functional recipes inspired by nature's healing properties

DELICIOUS KOMBUCHA FLAVORS: Try other SYNERGY Kombucha flavors, including Gingerberry, Cosmic Cranberry, Mystic Mango, Peach Paradise, Guava Goddess, Island Bliss, Elderberry Juniper, and Pomelo Pink Lemonade
product_description: GT's SYNERGY Strawberry Serenity Kombucha is crafted by nature for the living body. Imagine summer's ripest, most in-season strawberries, juiced into a one-of-a-kind kombucha that is exploding with flavor. This vibrant, nutrient-packed raw kombucha is bright, bold, and utterly delicious. Traditionally fermented in small batches for weeks—not days—using heirloom Himalayan cultures, it delivers billions of living probiotics to support gut health, immunity, brain function, and protein absorption. Since 1995, GT's Living Foods has been crafting functional recipes inspired by nature's healing properties. The family-owned and operated company has created a diverse portfolio of delicious and efficacious living foods for the living body. Each is made with the same unwavering commitment to real fermentation, real function, and real benefits as SYNERGY.

name: Essenzefruits Instant Lemon Lime Ginger Kombucha Powder Tea Mix Beverage - Sugar Free, Fermented & Dried - Just Add Water! Live Probiotics & Prebiotic Blend - Makes up to 30 Cups (8 Oz, 226g)
short_description: Essenzefruits Lemon Lime kombucha powder is lightly sweetened with apple prebiotic extract—no added sugars or artificial sweeteners. Prefer it sweeter? Just add honey, stevia, or your favorite natural sweetener to make it your perfect sip.
Our Lemon Lime Kombucha stands out with its unique blend of sweet apple and tangy ginger, available in an instant powder form for convenient preparation on the go.

This is real kombucha powder, naturally tart and tangy from authentic fermentation, not artificially sweet or flavored like soda-style drinks. No sugar, no shortcuts, just clean, functional ingredients.

Elevate your wellness routine with our Lemon Lime Kombucha on the go. Simply mix with water and enjoy the refreshing vitality it brings, wherever you go. Don't miss out on the opportunity to nourish your gut and tantalize your taste buds.

Essenzefruits Lemon kombucha powder contains no emulsifiers or gums, so natural clumping may occur. For best results, add to a small amount of water first, stir or shake well, then top off with cold or sparkling water.

Our kombucha powder is ultra-fine and free from anti-caking agents, so it may puff when opened, handle gently to avoid a kombucha cloud. We're also working to improve date labeling for easier tracking.

name: Agua Bucha | Kombucha Infused Sparkling Water | Meyer Lemon Flavor | Light & Delicious | Rich with Vitamins & Only 4 Calories | USDA Organic | No Artificial Ingredients | High B12 | 12 fl Oz (12 pack)
short_description: SPARKLING KOMBUCHA DRINK WITH BENEFITS: This organic kombucha infused sparkling water is delicately flavored and rich with vitamins and organic acids.
LOW CALORIES & LOW SUGAR: Each delicious can is made with naturally occurring ingredients with only 4 calories and 1 gram of sugar. No diet sweeteners.
3 DELICIOUS FRUIT FLAVORS: No vinegar taste! Agua Bucha comes in three light and delicious flavors such as Key Lime, Meyor Lemon, and Grapefruit to become your favorite sparkling water.
ALL ORGANIC KOMBUCHA: With no artificial ingredients, alcohol or preservatives, this kombucha drink has a single source of green tea, cane sugar, water, kombucha culture, and organic flavor.

EASY TO ENJOY BEVERAGE: This bubbly, crisp refreshing beverage is perfect for an everyday drink with sparkling flavor you’ll enjoy. Each 12 pack comes from Mother Kombucha, a women-owned business certified by WBENC.

name: Health Ade, Kombucha Guava Dragon Fruit Organic, 16 Fl Oz
short_description: Living Probiotics - Probiotics are living bacteria that are known to improve gut health. When consumed, they contribute to a diverse microbiome which helps the rest of your body stay balanced.

Organic Acids – During the fermentation process organic acids like acetic, lactic, gluconic and glucuronic acid are produced. These powerful “postbiotics” complete the many functions attributed to gut health.
Natural Antioxidants - Antioxidants make up your body's clean-up crew. These plant-based substances are known to support your body's overall health and wellbeing.
Real Fruit Juice - No artificial flavors or sweeteners! Our kombucha is flavored with real fruit juice from organic produce for a deliciously refreshing taste.
Certified - Organic, Non-GMO, Gluten-free, Vegan, and Kosher
product_description: Blushing pink and white guava find balance with sun-splashed dragon fruit in this fizzy, effervescent favorite.
